tool_description: Measures and interprets soil pH levels, providing acidity/alkalinity status and its implications for nutrient availability and crop growth.

buffer_ph.description: Buffer pH reading for lime requirement calculation

error_messages: Invalid pH reading: pH must be between 0 and 14.
Missing crop type: Specify the crop for proper pH interpretation.
Invalid buffer pH: Buffer pH must be between 0 and 14 if provided.
usage: Input ph_reading and crop_type for basic analysis. Include buffer_ph for lime requirement calculations.

ph_status.description: pH classification (strongly acidic, moderately acidic, neutral, alkaline, etc.)

crop_suitability.description: pH suitability for the specified crop

nutrient_availability.description: Impact on nutrient availability at current pH

lime_requirement.description: Recommended lime application rate in tons per acre
